Perceptor/Blackstorm:

Perceptor started to work quickly, first he retired the damaged 
parts, soon Maxima had lost the parts that would be ussless to her 
new body. "BLACKSTORM!!!!!"  shouted Perceptor by com link"What 
happen with the tools that I've requested????"

"Here are"said the femme while she came in room.

"Go and turn on the machine that is in the corder"replied 
Perceptor "I need that all would be ready in a short time"

Blackstorm nodded and walked to the corder and did what Perceptor did.

"You can leave but be ready"growled Perceptor"I could need you."

The femme noded and lef the room. while Perceptor untied Maxima and 
place in that machine, it was a part that looked as a pod, and it was 
used to change the beast mode of the bot; Perceptor closed the door 
and started to type some button scanning the data banks, looking for 
the DNA of two animals. After he did it, he started to uploads all 
the weapons that he had done and waited, expecting that the MAchine 
do all work.

Blackstorm left the room but still was in Medical bay Area, as 
perceptor commander her she was there waitting that Perceptor call 
her 'cause Perceptor might need her, deep inside she was 
angered what Maximals had done to Maxima. She desired revange, and 
show Perceptor that she could take care herself and she coould be a 
true Predacon and atrue warrior too.
